resources.name: 获取排课方案列表

actions.name: 获取排课方案列表

responses.body:
{
success: true,
message: "请求失败信息！",
data: [
 {
 schemeId: "schemeId001", // (string, required), 排课方案id
 schemeName: "排课方案5", // (string, required), 排课方案名称
 released: false, // (string, required), 是否发布
 mode: "同班同志愿", // (string, optional), 排课模式
 ruleMeetRate: 0.6, // (number, optional), 规则满足率
 progressRate: 0.6, // (string, required), 排课进度
 order: 0 // (number, required), 卡片显示顺序
 },
 {
 schemeId: "schemeId002", // (string, required), 排课方案id
 schemeName: "排课方案1", // (string, required), 排课方案名称
 released: false, // (string, required), 是否发布
 mode: "同班同志愿", // (string, optional), 排课模式
 ruleMeetRate: 0.6, // (number, optional), 规则满足率
 progressRate: 0.6, // (string, required), 排课进度
 order: 1 // (number, required), 卡片显示顺序
 }
]
}

actions.name: 调整卡片顺序
actions.description: `order` 是由 下划线 `_` 连接的 `schemeId`字符串， `schemeId` 顺序即表示卡片新的顺序

actions.name: 获取数据准备情况
actions.description: 数据准备状态`status`: `0` 未准备, `1` 已准备
